titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Graphic Services, Christmas Lecture Drawings for Posters
A Guide to the Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Graphic Services, Christmas Lecture Drawings for Posters FA933

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-03-02 14:42:33 -0500.

revisiondesc.item: Paper finding aid converted to EAD/XML by AureXus in 2010. Imported into the Archvistsâ€™ Toolkit by Becky Robbins.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller University records, Rockefeller University Press, Graphic Services, Christmas Lecture Drawings for Posters

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: In 1972 and 1973 special drawings were made that were used on the posters for the Christmas lectures in those years.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

did.unittitle: Christmas Lecture WHALES given by Roger Payne

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Due to the nature and potentially brittle condition of this material, special arrangements may be required in order to view materials. Individual items may be restricted due to preservation concerns.

did.unittitle: Christmas lecture HORMONES AND THE BRAIN given by Bruce McEwen

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Due to the nature and potentially brittle condition of this material, special arrangements may be required in order to view materials. Individual items may be restricted due to preservation concerns.
